page.title: 05MRS HARDING'S DAY
page.content: Mrs Harding, the{landlady}of The Halfway House pub, gets up at 8.00 . The first thing she does when she gets up, is make a pot of tea.Then her helper Janet,comes in at 9.00, to tidy up from last night.She{cleans}the tables,switches everything on, e.g the cooker,microwave,dishwasher, has a look down the cellar,makes sure everything is o.k.She{cooks}some more food ,because she serves meals ,sweets ,cakes, coffee ,tea and alcohol. The pub opens at 9.30 but by law alcohol is not allowed to be served before 11.30.She lives above the pub , and has two cats , and one dog. The most common drinks here were , wines and soft fruit juices . The least common drinks were liquors . In her{freetime she does her garden , rests ,and goes shopping.
